title: Baka Beautiful Baka Hair Butter - 2 oz.
features: 100% NATURAL Organic Hair Healthy Shea Butter & Tucuma butter
Infused with Argan, Jojoba, Almond, & Avocado Oils
MELTS IN YOUR HAIR combats DRYNESS
Nourishes & gives the hair a Healthy Sheen
description: BAKA HAIR BUTTER 100% NATURAL Organic Shea Butter infused with Organic Argan Oil Baka Butter MELTS in your hair and PENETRATES the HAIR SHAFT with HAIR HEALTHY Organic OILS of ARGAN, JOJOBA, AVOCADO and ALMOND. It just got Better with a touch of TUCUMA BUTTER for extra Moisture & Sheen. This combination of Shea & Tucuma Butter and Natural Oils combats DRYNESS, Itchy Scalp, Split ends, as it NOURISHES, gives the hair a Healthy Sheen. Finished with a light fresh natural oil fragrance. BAKA HAIR BUTTER is a Hair Healthy NATURAL ALTERNATIVE!
